D'Abramo F ,
Neumeyer S . A historical and political epistemology of microbes. Centaurus. 2020; 62: 321â€“ 330. 10.1111/1600-0498.12300

fn.p: Funding information Flavio D'Abramo conducted this work as part of a postdoctoral visiting fellowship offered by the Department I (research project: Knowledge in and of the Anthropocene) of the Max Planck Institute for the History of Science. Sybille Neumeyer conducted this work as independent artist and researcher.
